titles.title: A bill to eliminate the sunset for the determination of the Federal medical assistance percentage for Alaska.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/25/2005--Introduced. Amends the Medicare, Medicaid, and SCHIP Benefits Improvement and Protection Act of 2000 to eliminate the FY 2005 sunset for (thus making permanent) the determination of the Federal medical assistance percentage (FMAP) for Alaska under the Act.
